Job Title: BIM Consultant – Civil

Location: New York, NY

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Art/Creative, Design, Information Technology

Description:
Description  BIM Consultant – Civil  What’s GREAT about a career with Symetri  Symetri combines technology and business process consulting to help firms successfully plan, design, build and operate land and buildings.  As part of Symetri’s Infrastructure team, you are part of a company that is delivering solutions to improve the entire project delivery process, from planning and design, to construction and operations & maintenance. In other words, you’re joining a team that is dedicated to digitally transforming how we safely and sustainably modernize our infrastructure making it safer, more resilient, and expanding global competitiveness while reducing greenhouse gas emissions and transportation pollution by leveraging experienced subject matter experts, best in class technology partners, and purpose-built intellectual property solutions. 

The ideal candidate must work onsite in New York City four days and work one day remote.

Responsibilities

 Contribute to Technical Support  Provide Subject Matter Expertise pertaining to CAD, BIM, VDC, and GIS based workflows and technologies  Exemplify exceptional oral and written communication skills.  Communicate technical information to non-technical staff in a way that is easy to understand  Maintain a current knowledge of:  Application Functionality  Workflows and Technical Overviews  Non-traditional applications  Discover and collect technical intel, acting in your client’s best interests in a consultative role while anticipating challenges and recommending innovative solutions  Understand client needs, strategize, and identify opportunities for introducing Symetri and partner technology solutions along with consulting offerings which include:  Autodesk Products  Third Party Partner Products  Symetri Technologies  Consulting Services  CIO Advisory Solutions  Application Development Solutions  Embody collaborative skills across business units, regions, and disciplines while implementing industry tools across multiple platforms  Support the success of the Symetri sales team by providing technical presentations and recommending solutions  Deliver pre-sales client demonstrations  Maintain alignment of Symetri and Client business goals along with objectives throughout the longevity of the partnership  Travel to client site daily  Skills & Experience 

 4 years of practical experience in Civil Engineering within the following areas:  Direct experience with the process, workflow, and use of Autodesk AutoCAD Civil 3D, and related technologies from conceptual design thru construction of complex engineering projects  Direct experience with the implementation, use, and interoperability of GIS, particularly esri ArcGIS Pro  Knowledge of Integrated Project Delivery (IPD), Virtual Design and Construction (VDC) and other modern contractual delivery systems  Proven successful implementations of BIM platform technologies within a Civil engineering firm or government entity  Bachelor degree in Civil Engineering or related industry  Knowledge in sustainable design a plus  Professional registration (P.E., etc.) and industry accreditations (LEED AP) a plus  You’re a great fit as a Symetri Consultant if: 

 You are tech savvy and like solving problems 

(i.e. improving workflows, automating repetitive tasks, troubleshooting)

 You are proactive and enjoy learning new software programs  You thrive in a fast-paced, dynamic environment where every day is different  You can manage and prioritize multiple clients/projects at the same time  You are skilled in information gathering and technical discovery techniques  You work well independently but also in a team-oriented culture  You enjoy traveling and are comfortable with flexible working situations  You value a good work-life balance 

Benefits

We offer an enriching environment where learning and growing technically becomes part of your career. Symetri is dedicated to fostering the professional growth and development of our employees.

Symetri offers highly competitive salaries and a comprehensive benefits package including Aetna Medical with company funded HRA or HSA, Ameritas Dental, EyeMed Vision, Health and Dependent Care Flexible Spending Accounts and Commuter Spending Account options, company paid Life, STD and LTD insurances, 401K and Profit Sharing Plan with 35% match and generous paid time off and sick time policies.

Symetri is an Equal Opportunity Employer.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
